meanings.definition: To display or create an image using pixels.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy pixilating my photos to make them clearer.
meanings.sent2: She is pixilating the digital artwork to enhance its quality.
meanings.sent3: The artist was pixilating the picture with great focus and precision.
meanings.sent4: The computer program was pixilating the image in a matter of seconds.
meanings.sent5: Pixilating the photo made the details stand out beautifully.

meanings.definition: To break down an image into pixels.
meanings.sent1: When editing, remember not to pixilate the image too much.
meanings.sent2: The software automatically pixilates the image for easier editing.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally pixilated the picture, making it look like a mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The camera sensor was pixilating the scene into tiny squares.
meanings.sent5: Pixilating the photo revealed hidden patterns within.

meanings.definition: The act of forming an image using pixels.
meanings.sent1: Her pixilating of the landscape resulted in a stunning digital painting.
meanings.sent2: The pixilating of the logo was done with great attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The children were amazed by the magic of pixilating on the computer.
meanings.sent4: The art class focused on the beauty of pixilating in modern art.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition showcased the incredible world of pixilating.
